body: You can charge and make an attack with your paws.
name: Claw Pounce
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Catfolk/Catfolk Rogue Talents/Catfolk Feats/Claw Pounce

sections.body: Str 13, Dex 15, Nimble Striker, base attack bonus +10, catfolk, cat's claws racial trait or Aspect of the Beast (claws of the beast manifestation).
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you make a charge, you can make a full attack with your claws.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: Charging is a special full-round action that limits you to a single attack.
sections.name: Normal
